info.name: Write support for LDAP
info.summary: Adds support for creating, manipulating and deleting users and groups on LDAP via Nextcloud
info.description:
The write support for LDAP enriches the LDAP backend with capabilities to manage the directory from Nextcloud. * create, edit and delete users * create, modify memberships and delete groups * prevent fallback to the local database backend (optional) * auto generate a user id (optional) * and more behavioral switches
### Nextcloud 16.0.1 ###
Current Nextcloud 16.0.1 misses some bug fixes that will be included in 16.0.2. Full feature support is available for upcoming 17. A patch for 16.0.1 is available and has to be applied accordingly (please replace the path):
``` cd /path/to/nextcloud wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nextcloud/ldap_write_support/master/utilities/ldap_write_support-v16.0.1.patch git apply -p1 < /path/to/ldap_write_support-v16.0.1.patch ```
